author: Spike Kastleman
comment: I like it, but it's missing an option to change 'past' to 'after'.  "It's quarter after nine."

reply.author: Nico Weber
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback! Is this a regional thing? Where are you from? It should probably just say "after" by default for that country?

title: Missing one thing.

author: Nick Read
comment: I love word clocks, so having one on my wrist is awesome.

reply.author: Nico Weber
reply.content: Thanks for taking the time (heh) to leave a message! This should hopefully be better in v1.0.1.
